name: Chitwan
description: Flight from Dhaka to Don Mueang or Suvarnabhumi Airport Airport. On arrival to Airport, you will be welcomed by our representative and transferred to hotel for check in. A COVID test will have to be done.

name: Bangkok
description: Elephant Breeding center visit (after breakfast we will go jungle walk, bird watching, and canoe.You will see lots of crocodiles while canoeing and some rhino with their baby.)

name: Andaman Islands
description: Arrival at airport and our airport representative will be meeting you and brief a brief orientation, and transfer to your booked hotel/ Resort.
